item.title: Looking someone to make server with
item.dc:creator: @alexander_spicer alexander spicer
item.description:
@alexander_spicer wrote:

I’m looking for a hoster for my server. Message alexanderspicer@gmail.com in your intrested in hosting a highly edited DeltaScape source I’ve made.
Things I have done to it:
-Better PKing (some bugs fixed and new weapon bonuses/prices)
-Lots of Admin-like commands (I can remove these if you wish)
-One new quest fully added - 6 ready to be added - 4 to fix up some (not including the ones already on the source)
-Areas modified (start at lumby, most teles and NPCs in proper places)
-Working client for the server (still missing chevarly and piety)
-Better warnings for new players (wild warnings, warning for ::empty, etc)
-Magic spells fixed up
-Full Mage’s Bank minigame is half added, currently working on the other half (charging spells)
-More random events (Wise old man and Pirate ready to be added)
-Some protection from crashers
-Account info, IP changes, and password changes are all recorded for easy hack prevention
-Full working skulls (stay on login and last 6 minutes)
-More lunar spells working (NPC contact, humidify etc…)
-More suitable lunar GFX (client sided)
-Much more

Updates I plan to do:
-Full pest control
-More quests
-Work the way up to a full-map server
-And any others the players/hoster and I discuss and think would be a good idea

Why do I need a hoster?
I have Aliant Dial-Up internet. The rural area I live in does not have access to any other internet connections. I connect at a sad 28.8Kbps…

If you are intrested feel free to contact me at alexanderspicer@gmail.com.
Server IP: spec-veng-ko.servegame.com

Read full topic
